Configure Project/Keyword Expansion

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Workfiles | Keyword Expansion) to set which path separator is used for expanded keywords: forward slash (/) or backward slash (\) and whether or not the timestamp of the workfile is updated when Serena ChangeMan Version Manager expands keywords during check in.

Warning! Keyword expansion will cause corruption in binary files, so Version Manager disables keyword expansion by default. Do not enable keyword expansion for binary files.

Field Descriptions

Workfiles | Keyword Expansion
Path Separator Select either Forward Slash (/) or Backward Slash (\).
Update timestamp on expand keywords Select this check box to update the timestamps of workfiles when Version Manager expands keywords during check in.

See Also

Setting Keyword Expansion Options Keyword Expansion Options
